getStartedDescription: Create an account or log in to track your grades efficiently.
userIdNotAvailable: User ID not available after sign-up. Please try again.
enterEmailForReset: Please enter your email to reset your password.
resetEmailSent: A password reset email has been sent to your email address.
resetEmailError: Failed to send password reset email. Please check your email and try again.
privacyIntroText: At LetzGrade, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our services.
privacyEffectiveDate: This Privacy Policy is effective as of January 1, 2025 and applies to all information collected through our platform.
personalDataText: We may collect personal identification information, including but not limited to:
usageDataText: We also collect information on how the service is accessed and used. This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data.
dataUsePurpose: LetzGrade uses the collected data for various purposes:
dataUseProvide: To provide and maintain our service
dataUseNotify: To notify you about changes to our service
dataUseParticipate: To allow you to participate in interactive features of our service
dataUseAnalysis: To gather analysis to improve our service
dataUseMonitor: To monitor the usage of our service
dataUseDetect: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues
dataRetentionText: LetzGrade will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
dataRightsText: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data:
dataRightsAccess: The right to access your personal data
dataRightsCorrect: The right to correction of your personal data
dataRightsErase: The right to erasure of your personal data
dataRightsObject: The right to object to processing
contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
termsIntroText: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of LetzGrade. By accessing our platform, you agree to these terms.
termsEffectiveDate: These Terms are effective as of January 1, 2025.
userResponsibilitiesText: As a user, you agree to provide accurate information and comply with our guidelines.
acceptableUseText: Users must use LetzGrade responsibly and avoid the following activities:
acceptableUse3: Attempting to hack or exploit vulnerabilities.
acceptableUse4: Disrupting the service for other users.
terminationText: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend accounts that violate these terms.
disclaimerText: LetzGrade is provided 'as is' without any warranties of any kind.
governingLawText: These Terms are governed by the laws of Luxembourg.
